name: Necryre

active_effects.name: Elemental Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of all elements increases ninjutsu effectiveness.

active_effects.name: Weather Control
active_effects.description: Ability to manipulate weather provides environmental advantages.

appearance_summary: Necryre is a medium-built shinobi with weather-worn features and eyes that seem to change color with his mood. His hair is often windswept, and he carries himself with the confidence of one who commands the elements. His presence is often accompanied by subtle weather changes.
backstory_summary: Born with a rare affinity for all elements, Necryre developed the ability to manipulate weather and control the environment around him. He dedicated himself to mastering elemental techniques and became a key member of Konoha's Elemental Division. His ability to control weather and manipulate the battlefield has made him a formidable opponent.
personality_summary: Necryre is a powerful and adaptable shinobi who specializes in elemental techniques and weather control. He approaches combat with strategic thinking, using his elemental abilities to control the battlefield and adapt to any situation. His connection to nature makes him both powerful and unpredictable.
combat_directives: Use elemental techniques to control the battlefield and environment. Manipulate weather to gain tactical advantages. Adapt elemental attacks to counter enemy techniques. Prioritize environmental control and strategic positioning. Use weather manipulation to disorient and weaken opponents.
